additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 320 health, 1.6 health regen, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen, 16% spell damage and 16 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 320 health, 1.6 health regen, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen and 16% spell damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 320 health, 1.6 health regen, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen, 16% spell damage and 16 attack damage.
name: Kaya and Sange
description: Two of three known items of unimaginable power that many believe were crafted at the same enchanter's forge.
